subject: chore: triple rate limits for messages and chats
body:
Adjust rate limits to be less strict:
- Messages: 10/min → 30/min
- Chats: 5/hour → 15/hour
- Reports: 3/hour (unchanged)

Rationale: Allow more active conversation and legitimate chat
creation while still preventing spam bots and abuse.

Error messages already user-friendly:
"Rate limit exceeded. Maximum X [action]s allowed per [timeframe].
Please wait before trying again."
title: triple rate limits for messages and chats
